advanced.title: Advanced Settings for Dice Roller
advanced.name: Advanced Global Settings:
advanced.label: Configure Dice Roller
advanced.hint: Only settable by the Game Master.

enableHiddenRolls.name: Add Hidden Roll Toggles
enableHiddenRolls.hint: Buttons for mutually exclusive hidden rolls (Blind, GM and Self Rolls).

enableCthulhuD100.name: Add 'Call of Cthulhu' d100 Penalty / Bonus Toggles
enableCthulhuD100.hint: Buttons for 'Call of Cthulhu' d100 rolls: reroll the tens-die, taking highest for Penalty / lowest for Bonus.

enableExplodingDice.name: Add Exploding Dice Toggles
enableExplodingDice.hint: Buttons for mutually exclusive Exploding Dice rolls. NOT applicable to coin flips, Fudge or d100 rolls!

enableFudgeDice.name: Enable 'Fudge Dice'
enableFudgeDice.hint: For rolling 'Fudge Dice' (also known as 'Fate Dice') for your Fate and Fudge games.

enableCoins.name: Enable coin tosses
enableCoins.hint: For making coin flips (similar to d2 dice rolls).

maxDiceCount.name: Maximum dice thrown
maxDiceCount.hint: The max number of dice (from 1 to 25) you can throw with the Dice Roller. Requires reload!

enableFirstColumn.name: Add additional 1st column for rolling only 1 die
enableFirstColumn.hint: Note: the dice-icon column is always clickable and rolls a single die!

closeFormOnRoll.name: Close the Dice Roller on a successful roll
closeFormOnRoll.hint: If enabled, Dice Roller window will close on making a roll.
